trends: There have been 2 other sightings in White Rock
There were no other sightings in White Rock on or around November 5th 2011
Summary: was outside and noticed an bright object and grabbed my video camera and filmed over two minutes of the object pulsing with an electric charge inside it
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my deck in White Rock Located on the ocean a couple of minutes North of the USA having a smoke.I always look at the sky at night when i am outside as we get quite a few helicopters buzzing around the border so this time i saw the object in question and the first thought i had was to grab the video camera and the tripod.When i first tried to capture it on film it was moving just a little to the naked eye but it was still hard to get the camera to focus and of the 10 minutes of filming only 2 minutes were in good detail it just seemed to be flickering but with further inspection of the vide it tells quite a different story you can see it spinning on a pinkish center of light it is transparent and sometimes you can see what looks like a tesla coils bolts of electricity inside the orb coming from the pink center.I was excited when i played the film back and decided to post on youtube.The reason oi lost sight was the camera died and when i was in the house plugging in the charger and grabbing my wife's camera i guess the object disappeared don't know how or where it went.This statement is made with a sound mind and good mental health and is my best recollection of the event Thank-you for time and look forward to hearing from someone at Mufon Best Regards "L"
